title: Sam Phillips - 8 Albums
description:
8 albums by this talented chanteuse and composer.  Married to T-Bone Burnett for many years he also produced several of these efforts.  Many people I know used to write her off as "Producer's wife" saying she'd be nothing without the props T-Bone would put around her.  Well folks, even the best producers in the world need material to work with and Sam Philips wrote 99% of this material so I'd put it that she made T-Bone Burnett look good.  Truly a one-of-a-kind artist deserving of wider attention.  

Here are the albums:

A Boot and a Shoe
Cruel Inventions
Fan Dance
Martinis & Bikinis
Omnipop (It's Only A Flesh Wound Lambchop)
Sam Phillips Live February 5, 2005
The Indescribable Wow
The Turning

Enjoy and please seed!;-}

Junco
